mainEntity.headline: React Native Video Documentation
mainEntity.description: Official documentation for React Native Video component by TheWidlarzGroup

hasPart.headline: Installation Guide
hasPart.description: Installation instructions for your platform to link react-native-video into your project.

hasPart.headline: Properties
hasPart.description: This page shows the list of available properties to configure the player.

hasPart.headline: DRM Implementation
hasPart.description: We provide a sample implementation in the example app demonstrating how to use DRM with react-native-video.

hasPart.headline: Downloading
hasPart.description: The Offline Video SDK extends react-native-video (v6 or v7) with the ability to download and store video content for offline playback.

offers.name: Enterprise Support
offers.description: Expert support to extend or implement React Native Video capabilities
